languages.text: "Ты думаешь? Крупицы данных, которые могут оказаться ничтожными и даже тлетворными для нас самих... в обмен на соучастие в этой пытке?"

traits.locale_text: "Ты думаешь? Крупицы данных, которые могут оказаться ничтожными и даже тлетворными... в обмен на продление страданий?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "You think so? Tiny fragments of data that could prove worthless and even harmful to us... in exchange for participating in this torture?"
languages.original_text: "Ты думаешь? Крупицы данных, которые могут оказаться ничтожными и даже тлетворными для нас самих... в обмен на соучастие в этой пытке?"

traits.locale_text: "You think so? Tiny fragments of data that could prove worthless and even harmful to us... in exchange for participating in this torture?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You think so? Tiny fragments of data that could prove worthless and even harmful to us... in exchange for participating in this torture?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You think so? Tiny fragments of data that could prove worthless and even harmful to us... in exchange for participating in this torture?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You think so? Tiny fragments of data that could prove worthless and even harmful to us... in exchange for participating in this torture?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你是这么想的吗？你打算加入这场折磨之中……来换取那些可能毫无价值，甚至可能会对我们有害的数据碎片？”
languages.original_text: "You think so? Tiny fragments of data that could prove worthless and even harmful to us... in exchange for participating in this torture?"

traits.locale_text: “你是这么想的吗？你打算加入这场折磨之中……来换取那些可能毫无价值，甚至可能会对我们有害的数据碎片？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¿Eso cree? ¿Unos fragmentos minúsculos de datos que podrían ser inútiles, incluso perjudiciales... a cambio de ser partícipes de esta tortura?».
languages.original_text: "You think so? Tiny fragments of data that could prove worthless and even harmful to us... in exchange for participating in this torture?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Eso cree? ¿Unos fragmentos minúsculos de datos que podrían ser inútiles, incluso perjudiciales... a cambio de ser partícipes de esta tortura?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「そう思われるのですか？この拷問に参加することと引き換えに…無価値であることが証明された、我らにとって有害でさえあるデータの小さな断片を？」
languages.original_text: "You think so? Tiny fragments of data that could prove worthless and even harmful to us... in exchange for participating in this torture?"

traits.locale_text: 「そう思われるのですか？この拷問に参加することと引き換えに…無価値であることが証明された、我らにとって有害でさえあるデータの小さな断片を？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Meint Ihr? Winzige Datenfragmente, die sich als wertlos und sogar schädlich für uns erweisen könnten ... und dafür Komplizen dieser Folter werden?"
languages.original_text: "You think so? Tiny fragments of data that could prove worthless and even harmful to us... in exchange for participating in this torture?"

traits.locale_text: "Meint Ihr? Winzige Datenfragmente, sie sich als wertlos und sogar schädlich für uns erweisen könnten ... und dafür Komplizen dieser Folter werden?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Vraiment ? Vous seriez {mf|prêt|prête} à participer à cette torture en échange d'infimes fragments de données qui pourraient se révéler inutiles et même dangereux pour nous ? »
languages.original_text: "You think so? Tiny fragments of data that could prove worthless and even harmful to us... in exchange for participating in this torture?"

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? Vous seriez {mf|prêt|prête} à participer à cette torture en échange d'infimes fragments de données qui pourraient se révéler inutiles et même dangereux pour nous ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Öyle mi? Muhtemelen işimize yaramayacak, belki de bize zarar verecek veri kırıntıları... Karşılığında da bu işkencenin bir parçası olacağız ha?"
languages.original_text: "You think so? Tiny fragments of data that could prove worthless and even harmful to us... in exchange for participating in this torture?"

traits.locale_text: “Öyle mi? Muhtemelen işimize yaramayacak, belki de bize zarar verecek veri kırıntıları... Karşılığında da bu işkencenin bir parçası olacağız, ha?”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
